column1: Jp
column2: En

column1:
ほう、白竜様からの力は受け取っておる
今回もお前さんにこの技を伝えるかどうか
わしに品定めしろということじゃな
column2:
Indeed, the White Dragon's might flows through me.
Now I must assess whether you
are ready to inherit this art.

column1:
どれほど護り、鍛えてきたか――
実戦で見せてもらうことにしようかの
試練の場で落ち合おうぞ
column2:
How much you have protected and trained—
Let me see it in actual combat.
Let us meet at the trial grounds.

column1:
――試練の場である＜<STG 581>＞じゃが
<AREA 8>のエリアランクが
足りないと入れんからの
出発前に確認しておくのじゃぞ
column2:
--This is the trial ground <<STG 581>>,
but if your Rank in <AREA 8> is not
high enough, you cannot enter.
Check before departing.

column1:
どれほど護り、鍛えてきたか――
実戦で見せてもらうことにしようかの
試練の場で落ち合おうぞ
column2:
How much you have protected and trained—
Let me see it in actual combat.
Let us meet at the trial grounds.

column1:
――試練の場である＜<STG 581>＞じゃが
<AREA 8>のエリアランクが
足りないと入れんからの
出発前に確認しておくのじゃぞ
column2:
--This is the trial ground <<STG 581>>,
but if your Rank in <AREA 8> is not
high enough, you cannot enter.
Check before departing.

column1:
来たか
今回もワシが共に戦場を駆けるとしよう
さらに近くで見定めさせてもらうぞ
column2:
You have come.
Once more, I shall join you on the battlefield.
I will observe you closely this time.

column1: お前さんの積み重ねてきた砦"
見せてもらおうかの"
column2: Let me see how good a "shield" you truly are.

column1: ほれ、最初の試練が出たぞ
column2: Look, the first trial is here.

column1:
その調子じゃ
次は第二の試練の場所へ向かうぞ
column2:
Good.
Let us proceed to the second trial.

column1: 見つけたか、これが第二の試練じゃ
column2: You've located it... the second trial awaits.

column1: よしよし、次が最後の試練じゃ
column2:
Good, good.
The next one is the final trial.

column1: これが最後の試練じゃぞ！
column2: This is your last test!

column1:
お前さんの戦いぶり、その精神力
しかと見届けた！
新たな技の継承の儀式は灯台に戻って行おうかの
column2:
Your battle prowess and indomitable will -
I've seen them with my own eyes!
Now to the lighthouse we return,
for the rite of the technique.

column1:
お前さんの戦いぶり、その精神力
しかと見届けた！
column2:
Your battle prowess and indomitable will -
I've seen them with my own eyes!

column1:
新たな技の継承の儀式は灯台に戻って行おうかの
――さて、帰るとするか
column2:
Let us return to the lighthouse for the rite
of inheriting the new technique.

column1:
精神力でもって敵の力すら利用し
己自身を盾として皆を守る者
――そんなシールドセージに
お前さんは確かに近づいておるようじゃ
column2:
Using willpower to turn enemy force against itself,
standing as a living shield for others -
you're growing ever nearer
to becoming a true Shield Sage.

column1:
白竜様から賜りしこの技を使うにふさわしい
これからもよく護り、よく鍛えるようにな
column2:
You are worthy to wield this technique granted
by Lord White Dragon. 
Continue to protect and hone your skills.

column1: シールドセージはみなの砦であり灯台でもあるぞ
column2:
A Shield Sage is both a fortress 
and a beacon for all.

column1: 敵の攻撃を受け止め、反撃の力とするのじゃ
column2:
Let the enemy's blow be caught
and become your returning might.

column1: 敵の弱点属性を見極めることが大事じゃぞ
column2: It's important to identify the enemy's weaknesses.

column1: 味方がいるなら、その能力も把握しておくんじゃ
column2:
If you have allies, be sure to understand
their abilities as well.

column1: 属性を見極めた者が戦いを制するのじゃ
column2:
Those who discern these attributes 
will control the battle.

column1: 敵の弱点属性は把握しておるか？
column2: Have you grasped the enemy's weaknesses?

column1: 攻守の切替は自分にあった間合いをとるのじゃ
column2:
Switching between offense and defense requires
finding your own optimal distance.

column1: 状態異常を与えるタイミングも大事じゃな
column2: Timing to inflict status ailments is also important.

column1: 攻撃を防御してフォースバーストが基本じゃ
column2:
Defending attacks to build 
Force Burst is fundamental.

column1: 敵の動きを見極めることが肝心じゃ
column2: It's crucial to read the enemy's movements.
